After my mommy hit me my phone got up and showed the same orange chicken nugget and it started to LAUGH at ME. so I tried to get it and it stared running and screaming so I hit it and caught the phone and I turned it on and it worked but my apps were not working so I deleted this app and my phone shut down again and this time it played “FoREigna 💫😍forEiGna💅🥑fOreInA🌚✨” and then it died 😿 I started crying bc my phone was crying bc it was in PAIN😪 I didn’t know what to do😾 I realized I could CHARGE it 😽 so I got the charger and plugged it and IT WAS BROUGHT BACK TO LIFE but I’m pretty sure the phone got a virus🤒 so I went to go buy a NEW flip phone and I was so sad bc I wasted millions of dollars for it 😭.
